00038  * \file ngram_model_dmp32.c DMP32 format language models
00039  *
00040  * Author: David Huggins-Daines <dhuggins@cs.cmu.edu>

00043 #include "ckd_alloc.h"
00044 #include "ngram_model_internal.h"
00045 
00046 static ngram_funcs_t ngram_model_dmp32_funcs;
00047 
00048 ngram_model_t *
00049 ngram_model_dmp32_read(cmd_ln_t *config,
00050                        const char *file_name,
00051                        logmath_t *lmath)
00052 {
00053     return NULL;
00054 }
00055 
00056 int
00057 ngram_model_dmp32_write(ngram_model_t *model,
00058                         const char *file_name)
00059 {
00060     return -1;
00061 }
00062 
00063 static int
00064 ngram_model_dmp32_apply_weights(ngram_model_t *model, float32 lw,
00065                               float32 wip, float32 uw)
00066 {
00067     return 0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 static int32
00071 ngram_model_dmp32_score(ngram_model_t *model, int32 wid,
00072                         int32 *history, int32 n_hist,
00073                         int32 *n_used)
00074 {
00075     return model->log_zero;
00076 }
00077 
00078 static int32
00079 ngram_model_dmp32_raw_score(ngram_model_t *model, int32 wid,
00080                             int32 *history, int32 n_hist,
00081                             int32 *n_used)
00082 {
00083     return model->log_zero;
00084 }
00085 
00086 static void
00087 ngram_model_dmp32_free(ngram_model_t *base)
00088 {
00089     ckd_free(base);
00090 }
00091 
00092 static ngram_funcs_t ngram_model_dmp32_funcs = {
00093     ngram_model_dmp32_free,          /* free */
00094     ngram_model_dmp32_apply_weights, /* apply_weights */
00095     ngram_model_dmp32_score,         /* score */
00096     ngram_model_dmp32_raw_score,     /* raw_score */
00097     NULL                             /* add_ug */
00098 };
